properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh jagadrakshakaa vishwa vidhaata Rakshana nosagitivi Sarva krupalaku daatavu neeve Baliyaitivi maakai{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Krupa dwaaraa rakshana maa kosage Viswaasamu dwaaraane Apaatrula mainatti maaku Idi nee varamegaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapamulo memu maraninchi Nappudu vachchitivi ilaku Prabhuvaa memu nee chenta Nunda jeevamu nitchitivi ;{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapa bhaaramuche padi chedi Yunna mammunu ganchitivi Krupa dwaaraane mammunu Pilichi shaantini nosagitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakshana sandeshamunu Prabhuvaa prachuramu chesitivi Rayamuga viswasinchina maaku Aatmanu nosagitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Marugaina vaatini ajnaanulaku Bayalu parachitivi Marmamulanu grahinchutaku Jnaanamu nosagitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Seyanu maaku nitchitivayyaa Yuga yugamula varaku Shakhti maanthulamai ninu stutiyimpa Vijayamu nosagitivi{/lang-eng}
